title: Heart of Christ in Heaven towards Sinners on Earth
description: A Treatise demonstrating the Gracious Disposition and Tender Affection of Christ, in his Human Nature now in Glory, unto his Members, under all sorts of Infirmities, either of Sin or Misery. - Summary from Title Page

sections.title: Demonstrations from Christ’s last farewell to his disciples
Demonstrations from passages and expressions after his resurrection
Demonstrations from passages at and after his ascension into heaven
The first sort of intrinsical demonstrations, drawn from the influence all the three Persons have for ever into the heart of the human nature of Christ in heaven
A second sort of demonstrations, from several engagements now lying upon Christ in heaven Part 1
A second sort of demonstrations, from several engagements now lying upon Christ in heaven Part 2

Part 3 - Some generals to clear how this is to be understood, that Christ’s heart is touched with the feeling of our infirmities, together with the way how our infirmities come to be feelingly let into his heart.
A more particular disquisition, what manner of affection this is; the seat thereof, whether in his spirit or soul only, or the whole human nature. —Some cautions added.
This scruple satisfied, how his heart can be feelingly touched with our sins (our greatest inflrmities), seeing he was tempted without sin.
